candidate Profile Description.summary: Experienced in designing frameworks for deep learning-based online anomaly detection on automotive test benches. Skilled in machine learning, computer vision, artificial intelligence, and data analytics. Proficient in programming languages and tools such as Python, Matlab, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Docker.

programming: Python - Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, scikit-learn, Seaborn, TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, Flask, MLFlow

other_skills: Experience working in international and interdisciplinary teams
achievements: Second rank holder in college during bachelor's in mechanical engineering.

work_experience.title: Master's Thesis – Designing Framework for Deep Learning Based Online Anomaly Detection on Automotive Test Benches
work_experience.description: Designed framework permits early stopping of anomalous test procedures which saves huge resources in terms of time and money. The project involved development of ETL pipeline, deep learning-based anomaly detection method optimization and online implementation using docker on test benches.

work_experience.title: Internship – Model Library Creation for Deep Learning Based Multivariate Time Series Anomaly Detection
work_experience.description: Created an optimized model library for deep learning based multivariate time series anomaly detection using Tensorflow in python.

work_experience.title: Wissenschaftliche Hilfskraft
work_experience.description: Responsible for development of lecture, exercise content for the preparatory course in Mathematics for incoming master's students.

work_experience.title: Graduate Engineer Trainee (order and proposal Engineering)
work_experience.description: Provided engineering support to the assembly and sales departments through collaboration with internal and external stakeholders.

work_experience.company: Helical Auto Technology India Pvt. Ltd.
work_experience.title: Graduate Engineer Trainee (Development projects)
work_experience.description: Contributed to the establishment of a new press shop for the company.

courses: Artificial Intelligence and Data Analytics for Engineers

projects.name: Deep Learning based Object Detection on Nvidia Jetson Platform for Intelligent Wildlife Camera Trap Images
projects.organization: Techlabs Aachen and Wild Intelligence Lab (WIL)
projects.description: The project involved detection of number of animals per species, humans, and cars in the camera trapped images in Kalahari desserts.

projects.name: Design and Manufacturing of Automated Quality Inspection and Segregation System
projects.organization: Helical Auto Technology India Pvt. Ltd., Pune (India)
projects.description: Two independent machines for automated weld strength checking and automated segregation of OK and NOK parts were designed and manufactured.
